doc.title: 25 Strong
doc.plot: 25 Strong tells the story of the 25 Year history of the Kevin Bushell Pre Teen Basketball Classic which takes place in the Bedford Stuyvesant neighborhood of Brooklyn,New York. NBA players and Pre Teen alumni Stephon Marbury, Jamaal Tinsley and Rafer Alston are those interviewed in this documentary

25 Strong tells the story of the 25 Year history of the Kevin Bushell Pre Teen Basketball Classic which takes place in the Bedford Stuyvesant neighborhood of Brooklyn,New York. NBA players and Pre Teen alumni Stephon Marbury, Jamaal Tinsley and Rafer Alston are those interviewed in this documentary
